translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっちから渡してきた癖に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You handed it over first, yet you're...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしたってお前っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so, you...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ぷっ。くく、あははは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Pfft. Heh heh, ahahaha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「作戦成功、おめでとう……………って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mission accomplished, congratulations... but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんですか、これは……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what is this...?
Ah, brother...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、何？　ケンカ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? A fight?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームと連れだって、シーラ達がやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela came along with Cream and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガキが二人、じゃれてんの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two kids are just fooling around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっといていいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just leave them alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………はあ……なんだか、とんでもなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hah... somehow, I feel like I'm seeing something incredibly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 珍しいものを見ているような気が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rare...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 懐かしいです、なんだか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nostalgic somehow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この不器用ゴリラが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You clumsy gorilla!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父の墓にスターブラスター返してこい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go return the Starblaster to Dad's grave!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるせえ器用貧乏！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shut up, you jack-of-all-trades but master of none!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツラに似合わねぇ繊細なモン使ってんじゃねえ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't use delicate stuff that doesn't suit your face!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呆れる者、面白がる者をよそに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring those who were exasperated or amused,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はしばらく、諍い続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two continued their quarrel for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン共和国が、平和になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Helman Republic had become peaceful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス　メイザスの野――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rysus – the fields of Maysus—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血飛沫が舞い、一呼吸ごとに人の、魔物の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blood splattered, with every breath swallowing the lives of humans and monsters alike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命を飲み込んで、戦場が大きくうねる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: engulfing lives as the battlefield writhed immensely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広大な穀倉地帯であったこの地で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this vast granary region,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍と魔軍は一大決戦のさなかだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Rysus army and the Demon army were in the midst of a great battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押せ押せ押せ！！　押し込んで潰せ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Push, push, push!! Break through and crush them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……！　防げ！　好きにやらせるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh...! Defend! Don’t let them do as they please!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、そこの赤鎧！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you in red armor over there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様らが噂に名高い、赤の軍とやらか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you’re the infamous Red Army I've heard so much about!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らを叩き潰して、周りの雑魚どもの意気を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll crush you and break the morale of the small fries around you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 挫いてくれるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll put an end to them!
Guh...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一合、二合と剣が舞う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sword strikes exchanged again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、いただき！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, got you!
Gah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くはははははは！　隙ありだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kahahahaha! You've left an opening!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後から斧の一撃を受け、赤鎧は更に紅く染まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Struck by an axe blow from behind, the red armor was stained even redder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よろけた兵士の身体が大剣に斬り刻まれ、首が飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The staggering soldier’s body was slashed by a greatsword, his head flying off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ……こんなものか、リーザス！　人間！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah... is that all, Rysus? Humans!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま押し切ってくれるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll just push through like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、申し上げます！　第一陣、左翼が突破されました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I report! The first wave, the left wing has been breached!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは後背に回り込まれ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, they will get around to the rear...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「旗で合図。第二陣中央のジブル隊に対応させよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Signal with the flag. Have the Jible unit from the center of the second wave respond.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左翼の残存兵は撤退して再編」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The remaining soldiers on the left wing are to retreat and regroup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らは突破したと、闇雲に突進してこよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking they have broken through, they’ll recklessly charge forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その鼻先を魔法と弓で挫くのじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crush their charge with magic and arrows right at their noses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha, ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷静な老将の指示に幾分か落ち着きを取り戻し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calming somewhat at the calm old general’s orders,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nostalgic somehow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父の墓にスターブラスター返してこい！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるせえ器用貧乏！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shut up, you jack-of-all-trades but master of none!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツラに似合わねぇ繊細なモン使ってんじゃねえ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't use delicate stuff that doesn't suit your face!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呆れる者、面白がる者をよそに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring those who were exasperated or amused,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はしばらく、諍い続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two continued their quarrel for a while.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Helman Republic had become peaceful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス　メイザスの野――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rysus – the fields of Maysus—

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blood splattered, with every breath swallowing the lives of humans and monsters alike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命を飲み込んで、戦場が大きくうねる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: engulfing lives as the battlefield writhed immensely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広大な穀倉地帯であったこの地で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this vast granary region,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍と魔軍は一大決戦のさなかだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Rysus army and the Demon army were in the midst of a great battle.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you in red armor over there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様らが噂に名高い、赤の軍とやらか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you’re the infamous Red Army I've heard so much about!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らを叩き潰して、周りの雑魚どもの意気を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll crush you and break the morale of the small fries around you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 挫いてくれるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll put an end to them!
Guh...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一合、二合と剣が舞う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sword strikes exchanged again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、いただき！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, got you!
Gah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くはははははは！　隙ありだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kahahahaha! You've left an opening!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後から斧の一撃を受け、赤鎧は更に紅く染まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Struck by an axe blow from behind, the red armor was stained even redder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よろけた兵士の身体が大剣に斬り刻まれ、首が飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The staggering soldier’s body was slashed by a greatsword, his head flying off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ……こんなものか、リーザス！　人間！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah... is that all, Rysus? Humans!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま押し切ってくれるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll just push through like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、申し上げます！　第一陣、左翼が突破されました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I report! The first wave, the left wing has been breached!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは後背に回り込まれ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, they will get around to the rear...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「旗で合図。第二陣中央のジブル隊に対応させよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Signal with the flag. Have the Jible unit from the center of the second wave respond.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左翼の残存兵は撤退して再編」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The remaining soldiers on the left wing are to retreat and regroup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らは突破したと、闇雲に突進してこよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking they have broken through, they’ll recklessly charge forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その鼻先を魔法と弓で挫くのじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crush their charge with magic and arrows right at their noses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha, ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷静な老将の指示に幾分か落ち着きを取り戻し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calming somewhat at the calm old general’s orders,
